dmca.title: Google DMCA - Beijingtrip.com
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255
 

FROM: Catherine He 
Beijingtrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349
E-mail: edit@beijingtrip.com
 

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
DATE: December 22, 2006
Sent via email & fax
 

Dear Google, Inc.
1. I, the webmaster of www.beijingtrip.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.
 

The offender is www.mybeijingchina.com. They copied a quantity of contents from our website as listed below without our authorization. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing web pages.
 

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:
 

(1) Search Query: "The name of a hutong implicates its origin, location or history."
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/culture.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409215822/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/culture.htm  (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/hutong/hutong_culture.htm
 

(2) Search Query: "The Dwelling compounds or quadrangles (Siheyuan) - the enclosed, one-story courtyard"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/courtyard.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010630122248/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/courtyard.htm   (our June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/hutong/couryard_culture.htm
 

(3) Search Query: "when the Jin had capital here called Zhongdu, streets and lanes appeared"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/history.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20011121204352/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/history.htm  (our November 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/hutong/history_of_hutong.htm
 

(4) Search Query: "Beijing's hutongs, lanes or alleys formed by lines of siheyuan"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/hutong.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409235346/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/hutong.htm  (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/hutong/what_is_hutong.htm
 

(5) Search Query: "For those who are willing to probe the way the Chinese live"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/tour.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010410000544/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/tour.htm  (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/hutong/tour_of_hutong.htm
 

(6) Search Query: "The Great Wall extends for a good 3,000 miles from its origin"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/intro.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010303225039/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/intro.htm  (our March 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/index.htm
 

(7) Search Query: "Located 11km away from JuyongguanPass"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/badaling.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409213524/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/badaling.htm  (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/badaling.htm
 

(8) Search Query: "hence the name Huanghuacheng (Yellow Flower Great Wall)"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/huanghua.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020211003534/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/huanghua.htm  (our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/huanghuacheng.htm
 

(9) Search Query: "Jinshanling Great Wall is about 150 kilometers away from Beijing"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/jinshanling.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409215827/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/jinshanling.htm   (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/jinshanling.htm
 

(10) Search Query: "Mutianyu section of Great Wall"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/mutianyu.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409212110/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/mutianyu.htm  (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/mutianyu.htm
 

(11) Search Query: "Simatai Great Wall is the famous scenic spot for traveling, exploration and inspection."
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/simatai.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409212320/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/greatwall/simatai.htm   (our April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/great-wall-china/simatai.htm
 

(12) Search Query: "East Palace Gate"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20011121205056/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/gate.htm   (our April 2003 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/east_palece_gate.htm
 

(13) Search Query: "Hall of Benevolent Longevity"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20021021105823/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/benevolence.htm   (our October 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/hall_of_benevolence.htm
 

(14) Search Query: "Hall of Dispelling Clouds"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20021021111121/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/hall.htm  (our October 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/hall_of_dispelling.htm
 

(15) Search Query: "Tower of Buddhist Incense"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010625125003/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/tower.htm.   (our June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/tower_of_buddhist.htm
 

(16) Search Query: "Suzhou Market Street"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20011122192110/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/suzhoustreet.htm     (our November 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/suzhou_market_street.htm
 

(17) Search Query: "Studio of Distant Views (Tiaoyuanzhai) is located on the north bank of east section of the BackLake."
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020612134749/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/backlake.htm    (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/backlake.htm
 

(18) Search Query: "Seventeen-Arch Bridge"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010502153536/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/bridge.htm  
our May 2001 version    
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/seventeen.htm
 

(19) Search Query: "Located southeast of Kunming Lake and opposite to Longevity Hill"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010502142031/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/island.htm   (our May 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/the_island.htm
 

(20) Search Query: "Located on the north bank of Kunming Lake and the south foot of Longevity Hill"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020612140858/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/longgallery.htm  (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/summer-palace/long_gallery.htm
 

(21) Search Query: "Grand View Garden"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/grandview.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010628230712/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/grandview.htm  (our June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/beijing-attractions/grand_view_garden.htm
 

(22) Search Query: "Chinese Ceramic"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/ceramics.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20030216143050/http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/ceramics.htm
(our February 2003 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/special/ceramics.htm
 

(23) Search Query: "Chinese began to know and use jade in the early Neolithic Age"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/jade.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020206055122/http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/jade.htm  
(our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/special/jade.htm
 

(24) Search Query: "Chinese Silk"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/silk.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020603160926/http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/silk.htm (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/special/silk.htm
 

(25) Search Query: "According to Lu Yu, the writer of the book Tea Classics in the Tang Dynasty"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/tea.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020210071930/http://www.beijingtrip.com/feature/tea.htm  (our February 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/special/tea.htm
 

(26) Search Query: "The largest airport in China, BeijingCapitalAirport"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/airlines.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020603130157/http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/airlines.htm (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/beijing-transportation/getthere.htm
 

(27) Search Query: "China used to be called the sea of bicycles"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/airlines.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020603130157/http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/airlines.htm (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/beijing-transportation/getaround.htm
 

(28) Search Query: "The country code for China is 86 and the city code for Beijing is 010."
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/phone.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20020603145546/http://www.beijingtrip.com/essential/phone.htm (our June 2002 version)
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.mybeijingchina.com/travel-guide/communication.htm  (The paragraphs of Telephone Code are our copyrighted content)
 

(29) Search query
